abstract: The Raine Group, an investment boutique focused on the media and entertainment industries, made a top hire and closed on its first private equity fund.
snippet: The Raine Group, an investment boutique focused on the media and entertainment industries, made a top hire and closed on its first private equity fund.
lead_paragraph: The Raine Group, an investment boutique focused on the media and entertainment industries, said Tuesday that it had made a major hire and closed on its first private equity fund.
